channel.title: TrickScape 1.6 [PVM/PVP] [Skilling [ Unique Server]
channel.description:
[align=center][img]http://trickscape.com/images/logo.png[/img] [/align]
[align=center][size=x-small]TrickScape 1.6 [PVM/PVP] [Skilling [ Unique Server][/size]
[url=http://trickscape.com]Visit our site[/url] [url=http://trickscape.com/play.html]Play Now![/url] [url=http://up.ht/18vs7tU]Download 1.6[/url]
[i]Let me introduce you to a great server called TrickScape We started off on a shitty Deathlypvpz v4 after then we started coding on, Virtue base and now we have actually something quite unique.[/i]
[i]Ok, so i know you all know the base features but you want to know. What makes it real special.[/i]
[b]Unique Features[/b]
- PVP [Turn On / Turn Off] [ Everywhere ] - Save Teleports, ( Teleport everywhere) - Prestige Mode [ With Rewards] - Unique PvM Teleports [ Novice | Intermediate | Elite Bosses| [ - All Miasmic Spells [ Spellbook ] - Dungeoneering with floors - Real Nex Maps [ Nex Works 90% his minions are not aggresive] - Barrows Maps Complete - Tormented Demons Map Complete - Every Single Skill Working [ Except for construction which is useless] - Working on Toolbelt - Original Firecape 100% Working - Changing Completionist Cape [ Colors ] - Custom PK Points Store - Skill Resetter [ Which can reset your skills] - Loyalty Shop - Prestige Store
[b]Base Features[/b]
- Everything You Expect from a RSPS
[b]Media:[/b]
[b]PVP Anywere![/b]

item.title: TrickScape 1.6 [PVM/PVP] [Skilling [ Unique Server]
item.dc:creator: @trickscape317 trickscape317
item.description:
@trickscape317 wrote:

[align=center]
[/align]

[align=center][size=x-small]TrickScape 1.6 [PVM/PVP] [Skilling [ Unique Server][/size]

Visit our site
Play Now!
Download 1.6

Let me introduce you to a great server called TrickScape
We started off on a shitty Deathlypvpz v4 after then we started coding on,
Virtue base and now we have actually something quite unique.

Ok, so i know you all know the base features but you want to know.
What makes it real special.

Unique Features

  • PVP [Turn On / Turn Off] [ Everywhere ]
  • Save Teleports, ( Teleport everywhere)
  • Prestige Mode [ With Rewards]
  • Unique PvM Teleports [ Novice | Intermediate | Elite Bosses| [
  • All Miasmic Spells [ Spellbook ]
  • Dungeoneering with floors
  • Real Nex Maps [ Nex Works 90% his minions are not aggresive]
  • Barrows Maps Complete
  • Tormented Demons Map Complete
  • Every Single Skill Working [ Except for construction which is useless]
  • Working on Toolbelt
  • Original Firecape 100% Working
  • Changing Completionist Cape [ Colors ]
  • Custom PK Points Store
  • Skill Resetter [ Which can reset your skills]
  • Loyalty Shop
  • Prestige Store

Base Features

  • Everything You Expect from a RSPS

Media:

PVP Anywere!


[/align]

Read full topic
